data.text:
@mgmcwaggle @USDOT Hello Matthew, we apologize for the delay and inform you that we have forwarded your case, as soon as the analysy is completed you'll be contcated via e-mail.
We appreciate your understanding. Thank you.

@scaackler @CNNOpinion @JillFilipovic Hello Sasha Ackler@scaackler, in order to verify your refund request status, we kindly ask you to send us your booking reference or e-ticket number by private message. Thank you.

@DCFMonteiro Hello Diana, in order to verify the information, can you please inform us your bookings reference or the ticket number? For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you send it by private message. Thank you.
@LauraDesmond95 Hello Laura, we apologize for the delay and inform you that we are verifying the situation, we will get back to you as soon as possible via private message. Thank you.
@emore407 Hola Elizabeth, hemos contestado por DM. Gracias.
@MedienPfau Hello Alexander, we apologize for the delay and inform you that we have replied to your private messages. Thank you.
@Silgonlu1 Hello Luis, we inform you that we have relied to your private messages. Thank you.

@alex_parry_ Hello Alex, we kindly ask you to provide us with your booking code. 
For security reasons we suggest to send it by DM. Thank you.

@ernani_sch Cependant, nous vous assurons que tout est mis en œuvre pour le faire le plus rapidement possible. Nous apprécions votre compréhension et restons disponibles pour toute précision supplémentaire. Merci. (2/2)

@ernani_sch Bonjour Ernani, nous nous excusons pour ce délai et vous informons que votre reclamation est en cours de traitement.
Nous ne sommes pas en mesure de vous indiquer une date limite en ce moment. (1/2)
@josechenxu Olá José, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@bameroo @bameroo Hello Bameroo, we kindly ask you to send us a print screen through DM. Thank you.

@CarlaOl84163669 Olá Carla, lamentamos qualquer transtorno experienciado. Tal como indicado, a sua reclamação encontra-se em análise, que será finalizada com a maior brevidade possível. Caso tenha alguma questão adicional estaremos ao dispor. Obrigada.

@lonekayak @lonekayak Hello Patrick, we are sorry for the inconvenience. Can you provide us with your booking code in order to verify?
For security reasons we suggest to send it by direct message. Thank you.

@Kwabenalovesama Hello again Kwabena,
We have just replied to your DM.
@FilCGov Thank you for the details. We're verifying the situation and you'll receive a reply by email as soon as possible. Thank you
@imGretaas You're welcome. We have already replied to your DM. Thank you
@imGretaas We have replied to your new message. Thank you

@PaulineWeckel Bonsoir Pauline,
Nous vous prions de nous indiquer le code de votre réclamation. Pouvez-vous nous indiquer les détailles par message privé? Merci

@cedraz_diego Olá Diego,
Lamentamos a demora na nossa resposta e informamos que respondemos às suas mensagens privadas. Obrigada
@AndyGaby90 Hola! Hemos contestado a su mensaje directo. Gracias

@pespsanto Paulo,
O seu reembolso será processado com a maior brevidade possível. Obrigada
@vitormoreira Olá! Informamos que respondemos através de mensagem direta. Obrigada

@StephenDuffy2 @OurmieresChris Hello Stephen,
Please provide us with the complaint reference. For security reasons, we kindly request that you send us the details through a private message. Thank you

@TontonLyonnais Bonsoir Tonton,
Nous avons déjà répondu à vos messages privés. Merci

@amandamohar @JillFilipovic Hi! We have replied to your DM. According to our records, the refund has already been processed in 2020 (December). Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance
@FilCGov Hi Filipe, can you please tell us the complaint number? We suggest the details through DM. Thank you
@BBQBacalao Hola, cuál es su código de reserva o número de billete por favor? Le pedimos los datos vía mensaje privado por seguridad. Gracias
@Jake_TRT Hi Jake, please accept our apologies for the situation. We're verifying it and we will return our contact as soon as possible. Thank you

@BertvanWijk7 Hi! We deeply regret the delay in handling your complaint. Your case is still under review. Once the analysis is completed, you will receive feedback via email. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you
@paulo_cosendey Olá! Para que possamos ajudar através deste canal, necessitamos que nos envie uma mensagem direta com o código da reserva ou o número do bilhete eletrónico. Obrigada
@JoeZilla1 Hi! We are truly sorry for all the inconvenience and distress caused. If our assistance is still needed, please DM us your booking details. Thank you in advance
@imGretaas Hi! We have replied to your DM. Thank you in advance

@mariheffernan Olá Mariana,
Contacte-nos por favor via DM para a ajudarmos a concluir reserva. Obrigada.

@pespsanto Paulo,
Como indicado através de mensagem privada, poderá solicitar o reembolso da sua reserva. No entanto, a reposição dos voos não será possível, uma vez que os mesmos se encontram cancelados. Lamentamos uma vez mais todos os transtornos causados. Obrigada

@Toutannkharton @TAP_Portugal Bonsoir Arès,  
Nous avons déjà répondu à vos messages privés. Merci
@RehmLiv Hi! We have replied to your DM. Our apologies for the delay. Thank you in advance

@ChrisMalec13 Hi! Although we understand your urgency, your complaint is still under review. Once the analysis is completed, you will receive feedback via email. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance

@bethaniaguerra Olá Bethania,
Lamentamos a demora na nossa resposta. Devido ao elevado número de mensagens recebidas não nos foi possível responder de forma mais celere. Informamos que respondemos ás suas mensagens privadas. Obrigada
@rhavickTV Se ainda pudermos ajudar por esta via, necessitamos que nos envie uma mensagem direta com o código da reserva ou o número do bilhete eletrónico. Obrigada
@rhavickTV Olá Lamentamos desde já todos os inconvenientes causados pelo atraso do seu voo e que o serviço prestado não tenha ido ao encontro das suas expectativas.
@baritonelauren Hi! We deeply regret the delay of your luggage. We have replied to your DM. Thank you in advance
@nosoyariadna Hello Adriana, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@faelAmorim Por questões de confidencialidade, sugerimos o envio de mensagem direta. Obrigado.

@faelAmorim Olá Rafael, para verificarmos a situação, indique-nos por favor o número do processo e o endereço de e-mail associado.
Agradecemos desde já a informação.
@aslihantuna Hello Aslihan, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.
@Alberto95612463 Hello Alberto, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@dudadlk Olá Duda, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.description: A taxonomy of user interests.

data.text: @HevMM01 @visitportugal Hello Heather, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@AfzalGomes Hello Sandra, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

@JillFilipovic Hello Jill, can you provide us with your booking code and/or ticket number so that we may verify? For security reasons,we suggest to send it by DM. 
Thank you.

@leleportella Hello Leticia, we are sorry for any constraint. If we can assist regarding some question through this channel, please provide us with your booking code by DM.  
Thank you.

@fenner_michael Hello Michael, we understand the situation and assure you that your file is being analysed and that you will be contacted, via email, as soon as possible. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.

data.text: @AJ_Boswell Hello AJB, we are deeply sorry for the situation and all constraints caused. In order to verify the status of your file, please provide us with the file number and email associated. For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.
@3__Bells Hello The Bells, we have replied to your direct message. Thank you.

@AlisonDinning78 @AlisonDinning78 Hello Alison,
We answered per DM.

@AlisonDinning78 @AlisonDinning78 Hello Alison,
We answered per DM.
@rusyasurkova We understand the situation, however, we are not able to provide a time frame. Thank you.
@CassinariB Bonjour cassinari, nous avons répondu à votre message privé. Merci.
@_ClaraEstacio Olá Clara, respondemos à sua mensagem direta. Obrigado.
@saudiayoung Hello Saudia, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@ff72203 @cnnportugal @RTPNoticias @SICNoticias Hello Frank, we apologize for the delay and all constraints caused. In case we can be of assistance, please let us know. Thank you.

data.text: @IainCorby Hello Iain, in order to verify the situation, please provide us with your booking reference or the electronic ticket number. For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.

@rusyasurkova Hello, we apologize, but we are not able to predict when you will be contacted. We assure you that your file is being analysed and that you will be contacted, via email, as soon as possible. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.

data.text: @HochShotsNYC Hello Matt, we are deeply sorry for the situation and all constraints caused. In order to verify the status of your luggage, please provide us with the Property Irregularity Report (PIR). For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.
@ElanaBah De nada, @elanabah. Disponha sempre que necessitar de ajuda adicional. Obrigado.
@hannahmc38 @hannahmc38 We have replied to your direct message. Thanks.
@justin71730642 Hello j!, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.
@Furious_Salmon Hello Chicken Broth, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@hannahmc38 @hannahmc38 Hello Hannah, we replied by direct message. Thank you.

data.text: @rachelnclarke Hello Dr. Rachel, in order to verify the status of your new file, we kindly request you to provide us with the file number and email associated. For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.
@ClarisseTouzery Hello Clarisse, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@ElanaBah Olá @elanabah, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@natashasandamas Hello Tash, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@Fadotdot Olá Design struggles, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@ollaquindia1 Hola ollaquindia,
Para que sea posible verificar, le rogamos que nos proporcione su dirección de correo electrónico, la referencia de la reserva y el número de reclamacione.
Por motivos de confidencialidad, te sugerimos enviar esta información a través de DM.
Gracias.

@MonSrvAUclient Bonjour, afin de vérifier l'état de votre remboursement, nous vous demandons de bien vouloir nous indiquer le code de votre réservation ou le numéro du billet électronique. Pour des raisons de sécurité, veuillez nous envoyer l'information par message privé. Merci.
@yfreemark @USDOT Hi Yonah, can you please tell us your complaint number through DM? Thank you

@AguRamirezJ Hello Augusto,
we are verifying the situation. Therefore, you will be contacted via email as soon as possible. Thank you.

@GuylikeTim Hello Tim,
if you still need our assistance, please provide us the booking reference via DM or the passenger name, email address and complete itinerary. Thank you.

@queen_modise Hello Queen,
we have replied via DM. Thank you.
@Rodrig0Salgado Hi! We have replied to your DM. Thank you in advance

@truculent_1 Hi! We inform that your complaint is still under review. Once the analysis is completed, you will receive feedback via email. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance

@wrunbiebs Hi! We inform that your complaint is still under review. Once the analysis is completed, you will receive feedback via email. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.
@nuria_gz @eigree Hola! Lamentamos la situación reportada. Hemos contestado a su mensaje direct. Gracias
@IvanGallego92 Quedamos a su entera disposición para cualquier duda o aclaración adicional.

@IvanGallego92 Hola! Lamentamos la demora y le informamos que las reclamaciones siguen bajo análisis. Una vez completado el análisis, se le contactará por correo electrónico, por lo que le pedimos que espere por favor.
@lespinoza85 Hola! Para que podamos comprobar la situación, por favor envíe un mensaje directo con el número de reserva. Gracias.

@HaisamIdo Hello Haisam,
please provide us your email address via private message in order to verify. Thank you.

@zahidahmedch Hello zahid,
please provide us via DM the following details:
- your email address
- booking reference or ticket number
- detailed claim

Thank you.
@Laminsa96487533 Hi! We have in the meantime replied to your DM. Thank you in advance
@LlambrionLeon Hola Llambrion, tendria de hacer la reserva y pago para un equipaje deportivo. Gracias
@Sally23555314 Hi! To better assist you, please DM us your complaint number, as well as the email address linked to it. Thank you in advance

@SamuelRourke2 Hi! If you have already submitted a complaint online, you will need to await our feedback via email, which will happen once the analysis is completed. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance
@DaniMarksPR Hi! We have in the meantime already replied to your DM. Thank you in advance
@MattLoxham Hi! To better assist you, please DM us your booking information and send us a print screen of the errors encountered. Thank you in advance

users.name: Le râleur de Mon Service AU Client
